messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~J0(6.0)}Like I've been{~N}run over by a truck,{~N}but I'm all right, I guess.{~E}
{~J0(5.0)}You from around here?{~N}Why don't you{~N}tell me what happened?
{~J0(5.2)}I came here for a vacation.{~N}I just got here...
{~J0(4.0)}Just turned seven last month...{~N}Short, black hair...
{~J0(3.0)}The only person I've seen{~N}in this town is you.
{~J0(3.5)}I'd tell you if I knew,{~N}believe me.
{~J0(5.5)}But, from what I can tell,{~N}something bizarre is going on.
{~J0(4.0)}I'm a police officer{~N}from Brahms,{~N}the next town over.
{~J0(3.0)}The phones are all dead,{~N}and the radio, too.
{~J0(4.0)}I'm going back to call{~N}in some reinforcements.
{~J0(5.0)}In that case,{~N}I need to find her now!{~N}Cheryl's my little girl.
{~J0(3.0)}I can't just leave her out{~N}there by herself.{~E}
{~J0(5.0)}Take this.{~N}And hope you don't{~N}have to use it.
{~J0(4.5)}before you pull the trigger,{~N}know who you're shooting.
{~J0(3.0)}And don't do it{~N}unless you have to.{~E}
{~J0(5.0)}You'd do best to stay nearby.{~N}I'll be back with{~N}help as quick as I can.{~E}
{~J0(4.5)}Huh? Radio?{~N}What's going on with that radio?{~E}
A radio...is it broken?{~N}Can't hear anything.{~E}
Maybe I should check for{~N}something useful before leaving.{~E}
{~J0(4.3)}This is not a dream!{~N}What's happening to this place!?{~E}
I'll worry about the radio later,{~N}I have more important stuff{~N}to do.{~E}
I've got to beat that monster!{~E}
The radio may be{~N}useful for something.
I better take it with me.{~E}
Can't turn on the TV.{~N}No power?{~E}
I have more important stuff to do.{~E}
